s.text: and then i just i had the baby and then it was just like i forgot all about it and every once in a while i'll be digging through the closet and i'll find that thing and i'll think oh maybe i ought to get the rest of that out you know and finish it

and then i i really enjoy sewing but i don't get much of a chance to just really sit down and do much sewing how about you
